attributes.action: PAY CIVILLIAN SUPPORT STAFF IN LINE WITH OTHER MOD STAFF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: DURING ANY CONFLICT INVOLVING THE BRITISH ARMY. CIVILLIAN STAFF WORK JUST AS HARD AS THEIR MILITARY COUNTERPARTS, THEY NEVER RECEIVE ANY GRATITUDE FOR THEIR EFFORTS ESPECIALY IN GERMANY AND CYPRUS THEY ARE USED ABUSED AND FORGOTTEN BY THE BRITISH GOVERMENT

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
